casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Scott BADGETT. No. 522A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 26, 2006. James R. Glover, Chapel Hill, for Badgett. Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of June 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 30th day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of June 2006."
